sentences.en: About 120 freshwater fish species are indigenous to Hong Kong.
sentences.cn: 有大约一百二十个淡水鱼品种是产于香港的.

sentences.en: An alternative is genuine old pasture Kentish indigenous ryegrass.
sentences.cn: 可供选择的一种牧草是真正的英国肯特郡的土生的黑麦草.

sentences.en: An epidemic resulted in overt measles in 99.9 per cent of the indigenous population.
sentences.cn: 一次流行引起99.9%土著居民患有明显的麻疹.

sentences.en: Are extic pests more easily controlled than indigenous pests?
sentences.cn: 外杂害虫比本地害虫更容易防治 吗 ?

sentences.en: Businesses crave Chinese workers, for want of sober indigenous ones.
sentences.cn: 当地商业急需中国工人, 因为缺少清醒的本地劳动力.

sentences.en: German and a number of indigenous language are also widely used.
sentences.cn: 黑人和60%的白人使用南非荷兰语,德语和一些本地语言也通用.

sentences.en: I was handled full manuscripts of unpublished books by indigenous writers.
sentences.cn: 土生土长的作者把未出版的书籍的完整手稿交给了我.

sentences.en: Indians were the indigenous inhabitants of America.
sentences.cn: 印第安人是美洲的土著居民.

sentences.en: Indigenous peoples and conquerors gradually coalesced into the present - day population.
sentences.cn: 土生土长的人们和征服者们逐渐合并成现在的居民人口.
袋鼠为澳大利亚本地的动物.

sentences.en: Kiwi is a fruit that is indigenous to New Zealand.
sentences.cn: 奇异果是纽西兰当地的水果.

sentences.en: Love and hate are emotions indigenous to all humanity.
sentences.cn: 爱与恨是人类固有的感情.

sentences.en: Many of the indigenous insects are needed to pollinate the local plants.
sentences.cn: 需要很多种土生昆虫给当地植物授粉。

sentences.en: The designs used in the indigenous arts and crafts of this tribe are unique.
sentences.cn: 这个部落自己生产的工艺品的设计很独特.

sentences.en: the many indigenous cultures which existed in Siberia
sentences.cn: 存在于西伯利亚的许多当地文化

sentences.en: The plants are indigenous to Mexico.
sentences.cn: 那些植物(原)产于墨西哥.

words.tran_cn: 本地人；土著；动植物的自生种；本地产的动植物（等于indigene）

phrases.tran_cn: 本地知识；乡土知识；土著知识

trans.tran_cn: 土生土长的，生来的，固有的，本地的，根生土长
trans.tran_en: indigenous people or things have always been in the place where they are, rather than being brought there from somewhere else
